member.name: M:aspDocker.Controllers.NoteController.Get(aspDocker.ToolModels.NoteFilterModel)
member.summary: Get all notes for the specified UserId
member.remarks: Allows for returning a list of Notes based on various input parameters.
member.param: A Query Object that will deconstruct the various parameters provided

member.name: M:aspDocker.services.DatabaseManagementService.MigrationInitialisation(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Apply the latest migrations to the specified context

member.name: T:aspDocker.ToolModels.NoteFilterModel
member.summary: A Utility class to handle various parameters recieved when querying the Note Endpoints

member.name: P:aspDocker.ToolModels.NoteFilterModel.Page
member.summary: The Page to display - used by the Skip method, with the provided value - 1 multiplied by the provided items per page

member.name: P:aspDocker.ToolModels.NoteFilterModel.ItemsPerPage
member.summary: The number of items to display per page, Default of 10

member.name: P:aspDocker.ToolModels.NoteFilterModel.UserId
member.summary: the UserId to show notes for, if blank will show notes for all users

member.name: P:aspDocker.ToolModels.NoteFilterModel.NoteTitleContains
member.summary: Text to filter Note titles by

member.name: P:aspDocker.ToolModels.NoteFilterModel.NoteTextContains
member.summary: Text to filter Note bodies by
